name: EditMonitorConfigPolicy
description:
Edit an existing monitor configuration policy in Datadog.

This tool allows you to update the configuration of an existing monitor policy in Datadog by specifying the policy ID. Use it when changes to monitor policies are required.

parameters.name: monitor_policy_id
parameters.description: The ID of the monitor configuration policy to be updated.

value_schema.description: ID of the monitor configuration policy.

parameters.name: monitor_policy_update
parameters.description: JSON object detailing the update to the monitor configuration policy, including attributes, policy type, and ID.

attributes.description: Policy and policy type for a monitor configuration policy.

id.description: ID of this monitor configuration policy.
